TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Pongodan, title = Pongodan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pongodan} }

S.FORM: alang Pongodan ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Taitung Si, kwara sali buwan nya ga 397 buwan, 1,040 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 58% kyan ku 600 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 42% kyan ku 440 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 47%, Paywan 1%, Bunun 1%, Puyuma 5%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Pongodan hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Pongodan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Pongodan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Pongodan hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Pongodan hya' ga Fukid. tay 'llaw na Pongodan hya' ga Kakawasan. tay 'zil na Pongodan hya' ga Puyuma. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Pongodan ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Pongodan ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Pongodan ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Taitong Si, kwara sali bowan nya ga 397 bowan, 1,040 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 58% kyan ko 600 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 42% kyan ko 440 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 47%, Paywan 1%, Bonon 1%, Poyoma 5%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Pongodan hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Pongodan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Pongodan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Pongodan hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Pongodan hya' ga Fokid. tay 'llaw na Pongodan hya' ga Kakawasan. tay 'zil na Pongodan hya' ga Poyoma. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Pongodan ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Pongodan ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
